00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "TShapeSize3DNB1.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqMatrix.hpp"
00036 #include "TMPDerivs.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 std::string TShapeSize3DNB1::get_name() const
00041   { return "TShapeSize3DNB1"; }
00042 
00043 TShapeSize3DNB1::~TShapeSize3DNB1() {}
00044 
00045 bool TShapeSize3DNB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00046                                 double& result, 
00047                                 MsqError& )
00048 {
00049   const double nT = Frobenius(T);
00050   const double tau = det(T);
00051   const double tau1 = tau-1;
00052   result = nT*nT*nT - 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*tau + mGamma*tau1*tau1;
00053   return true;
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 bool TShapeSize3DNB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00058                                           double& result, 
00059                                           MsqMatrix<3,3>& wrt_T,
00060                                           MsqError&  )
00061 {
00062   const double nT = Frobenius(T);
00063   const double tau = det(T);
00064   const double tau1 = tau-1;
00065   result = nT*nT*nT - 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*tau + mGamma*tau1*tau1;
00066   
00067   wrt_T = T;
00068   wrt_T *= 3*nT;
00069   wrt_T -= (3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE - 2*mGamma*tau1) * transpose_adj(T);
00070   
00071   return true;
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool TShapeSize3DNB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00075                                           double& result,
00076                                           MsqMatrix<3,3>& wrt_T,
00077                                           MsqMatrix<3,3> second[6],
00078                                           MsqError& err )
00079 {
00080   const double nT = Frobenius(T);
00081   const double tau = det(T);
00082   const double tau1 = tau-1;
00083   result = nT*nT*nT - 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*tau + mGamma*tau1*tau1;
00084   
00085   const double f = (3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE - 2*mGamma*tau1);
00086   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00087   wrt_T = T;
00088   wrt_T *= 3*nT;
00089   wrt_T -= f * adjt;
00090   
00091   set_scaled_outer_product( second, 2 * mGamma, adjt );
00092   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, -f, T );
00093   pluseq_scaled_I( second, 3*nT );
00094     // Could perturb T a bit if the norm is zero, but that would just
00095     // result in the coefficent of the outer product being practically 
00096     // zero, so just skip the outer product in that case.
00097     // Anyway nT approaches zero as T does, so the limit of this term
00098     // as nT approaches zero is zero.
00099   if (nT > 1e-100)  // NOTE: nT is always positive
00100     pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second, 3/nT, T );
00101   
00102   return true;
00103 }
